description.zh: NextChat 是一个轻量且快速的 AI 助手，支持包括 Claude、DeepSeek、GPT-4 和 Gemini Pro 在内的多种模型。它提供网页和桌面界面用于与 AI 模型交互，强调速度、隐私和定制化。该项目支持跨平台部署，适用于个人和企业使用场景。
description.en: NextChat is a lightweight and fast AI assistant supporting multiple models including Claude, DeepSeek, GPT-4, and Gemini Pro. It provides a web and desktop interface for interacting with AI models, emphasizing speed, privacy, and customization. The project is deployable across platforms and supports both public and enterprise use cases.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量快速，支持跨平台部署
- 强调隐私保护，数据本地存储
- 支持多种 AI 模型及私有化部署
- 企业级定制能力强，支持品牌、权限和知识库集成

## 功能列表:

- 支持一键部署到 Vercel
- 支持跨平台桌面客户端（Windows、macOS、Linux）
- 兼容自建模型如 RWKV-Runner 和 LocalAI
- 隐私优先设计，数据本地浏览器存储
- 支持 Markdown、LaTeX、mermaid 图表和代码高亮
- 响应式设计，支持暗黑模式和 PWA
- 首屏加载速度快，支持流式响应
- 支持通过提示模板创建、分享和调试聊天工具
- 集成社区优质提示模板
- 自动压缩聊天历史以支持长对话并节省 Token
- 支持 15 种以上语言的国际化
- 支持实时聊天
- 插件系统支持联网搜索、计算器和自定义 API
- 支持内容预览、复制和分享（Artifacts）
- 支持 MCP（模型上下文协议）
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and fast deployment across platforms
- Strong emphasis on user privacy with local data storage
- Supports a wide range of AI models and private deployments
- Highly customizable for enterprise use with brand, permissions, and knowledge integration

## Features:

- One-click deployment on Vercel
- Cross-platform desktop clients (Windows, macOS, Linux)
- Compatibility with self-hosted LLMs like RWKV-Runner and LocalAI
- Privacy-first design with local browser data storage
- Markdown support including LaTeX, mermaid, and code highlighting
- Responsive design with dark mode and PWA support
- Fast first-screen loading speed with streaming response support
- Prompt templates for creating, sharing, and debugging chat tools
- Integration with awesome prompts from community resources
- Chat history compression for long conversations and token savings
- I18n support for over 15 languages
- Realtime chat support
- Plugin system including network search, calculator, and custom APIs
- Artifact preview, copy, and share capabilities
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) support
